product_name: The North Face Snowtropolis Lace Boots - Women's
long_description: Navigate the snow-covered metropolis with the premium waterproof, insulated women's Snowtropolis Lace boots from The North Face. Constructed with premium materials, these waterproof leather and suede boots pair with ample 200g PrimaLoft(R) Eco insulation for warmth during the coldest months. Cuffs can be worn upright or folded down to expose the sweater-knit lining. Boots are lined with moisture-wicking Trek-Dry(R) linings. Compression-molded EVA midsoles and hardened EVA shanks provide good support for long days on your feet. The North Face Snowtropolis Lace boots have medial waterproof zippers that allow easy on and off. Underneath, the TNF(TM) Winter Grip outsoles incorporate Ice Pick lugs for superior traction.
short_description: Navigate the snow-covered metropolis with the premium waterproof, insulated women's Snowtropolis Lace boots from The North Face.
